articles.title: Man suspected of Brown University shooting, MIT professor slaying found dead in N.H. storage facility, authorities say
articles.description:
is used to specify article abstract. You can only provide plain text in this element. --> A 48-year-old man was behind both the Brown University shooting that killed two and injured nine and the killing of an MIT professor in Brookline, officials said Thursday night. He took his own life in Salem, N.H., police said.

The post Man suspected of Brown University shooting, MIT professor slaying found dead in N.H. storage facility, authorities say appeared first on Boston.com.

]]>
